IVRText.Greeting: Hello, thank you for calling Magenta.
IVRText.AccountIdValidation: I don't seem to recognize the phone number you're calling from. Please say or enter your 6 digit customer ID to continue.
IVRText.AccountIdDtmfValidation: I don't seem to recognize the phone number you're calling from. Please enter your 6 digit customer ID to continue.
IVRText.AccountIdValidationFailed: I didn't recognize that customer ID.
IVRText.MainMenu: Please press 1 or say home for Magenta Home.  Please press 2 or say mobile for Magenta Mobile.  Please press 3 or say TV for Magenta TV.  Please press 4 or say end call to end the call.
IVRText.Magenta: Please stay on the line while we connect you to our next available agent.
IVRText.MagentaHome: Thank you for choosing Magenta Home, please wait while we connect you to the next available agent.
IVRText.MagentaMobile: Thank you for choosing Magenta Mobile, please wait while we connect you to the next available agent.
IVRText.MagentaTV: Thank you for choosing Magenta TV, please wait while we connect you to the next available agent.
IVRText.InvalidAudio: No input received disconnecting the call. Goodbye.
IVRText.NoResponse: I didn't hear any input from you. Thank you, Goodbye.
IVRText.ScheduledCallbackOffered: Would you like us to call you back at a later time? Please press 1 or say yes to schedule a callback. Please press 2 or say no if you would like to remain on the line.
IVRText.ScheduledCallbackTimeSelection: When would you like us to call you back? Please press or say 1 to be called as soon as possible.  Please press or say 2 to be called back in {0} minutes.  Please press or say 3 to be called back in {1} minutes.
IVRText.ScheduledCallbackAccepted: An agent will be calling you back in {0} {1}.  Thank you for using our callback service, good bye.
IVRText.ScheduledCallbackRejected: An agent will be with you shortly.
IVRText.ScheduledCallbackDialout: Hello, this is Magenta calling you back. Please press or say 1 if you would still like to speak to an agent.  Please press or say 2 if you no longer need any assistance.
IVRText.ScheduledCallbackDialoutAccepted: Please stay on the line.  An agent will be with you shortly.
IVRText.QueryCustomerPrompt: What can I help you with today? Please say what you need help with or press any key at any time to speak with a specific department.
IVRText.PairingCompleted: Let me get you connected to someone in our {0} service department who can look into this.
IVRText.PairingCompletedOther: Let me get you connected to someone who can look into this.
IVRText.CustomerQueryTimeout: I'm sorry, I wasn't quite able to hear that.
IVRText.PostCallSurvey: Thank you for staying on the line. How would you rate your customer service experience during this call today? Press 1 for satisfied, 2 for neutral, or 3 for dissatisfied.
